sentences.sContent: an urban underclass, who have limited access to health care
sentences.sCn: 不能充分享受医疗服务的城市贫困阶层

synos.tran: 下层阶级，下层社会；一、二年级学生

trans.tranCn: 下层阶级，下层社会；一、二年级学生
trans.tranOther: the lowest social class, consisting of people who are very poor and who are not likely to be able to improve their situation
